entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having already crossed the crenellated ramparts and dismounting. He is also described as clutching at his chest with his blackened hand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as landing next to Dumbledore seconds later and looking around. He is also instructed by Dumbledore to go and wake Severus.

entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is mentioned as someone who needs to be woken up by Harry.

entities.name: the mark
entities.description: The Mark is described as a green skull with its serpent's tongue glinting evilly above them.

entities.name: the castle
entities.description: The castle is mentioned as the place where Dumbledore and Harry are standing.

entities.name: the ramparts
entities.description: The ramparts are described as being deserted.

entities.name: the door
entities.description: The door is mentioned as leading to the spiral staircase that led back into the castle.

relationships.description: Dumbledore instructs Harry to go and wake Severus.
Dumbledore is affected by the situation, which requires him to instruct Harry to go and wake Severus.
